Title: Senior Data Scientist, Delivery
Description:
Join our Delivery Data Science team build advanced models, and help shape the future of online services while improving user experiences for millions worldwide.

About Us

With over 200 million customers in 50+ countries, Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa. And it's all thanks to our people.

We believe in creating an inclusive environment where everyone is welcome, regardless of race, colour, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, or disability.

Our ultimate goal is to make cities for people, not cars, and we need your help to achieve this mission!

About The Role

You will be building models to estimate the food delivery time at various stages of the order, such as before and after the order has been accepted. You will also build complex ranking pipelines for our textual search and recommendation engines, using optimization techniques for dispatching and demand/supply balancing to minimize the delivery time of our orders.

Main tasks and responsibilities:


Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Data Analysts, Data Egineers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers, to gain a deep understanding of business needs and create end-to-end technical solutions for them.
Deploying and validating solutions for millions of users, enabling fast feedback and measurable added value to customers.
Rapidly deploying models to production environments using AWS and internal machine learning platforms, leveraging a toolkit that includes Python, Spark, Presto, Docker, SageMaker, and Airflow for efficient data processing and model deployment.
Engaging in regular knowledge exchange with Data Scientists across all seniority levels, fostering a collaborative environment that promotes learning and innovation.
Solving real-world problems on a wide variety of tasks, such as ranking, textual search, recommendation, user clustering, pricing, delivery time estimation, dispatching, and demand/supply balancing.
Applying the most advanced techniques, such as deep learning, gradient boosting, causal inference, mathematical optimization, dimensionality reduction, time series forecasting, and more.



About you:


You have 5 years of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning, ideally in product development within a technology-focused company.
You‚Äôre skilled in Python programming, leveraging key libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and OR-tools for data analysis and modelling, with practical experience in statistical hypothesis testing that allows you to independently identify problems, explore trends, and discover opportunities through data-driven methods.
You have a proactive mindset, a willingness to take initiative and work with little supervision, and enthusiasm for collaborating with different roles in product, analytics, and engineering to identify problems, explore trends, and discover growth opportunities.
You exhibit excellent teamwork and strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written, enabling clear collaboration and knowledge-sharing.
You have hands-on experience in building ML systems from end to end, including testing, monitoring, scaling, and measuring the impact.



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don‚Äôt tick every box, please consider applying!

Why you‚Äôll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode with a minimum of 3 days in the office each week to foster strong connections and teamwork.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location and role.

Title: Software Engineer, Python
Description:
About Us

Engelhart was founded in 2013 by BTG Pactual Group as a commodities trading company. Its business model is ‚Äúasset light‚Äù and highly diversified ‚Äì giving it the ability to adapt effectively and nimbly to changing market conditions. It has assembled successful multidisciplinary teams, leveraging advanced fundamental analysis with deep quantitative and weather research capabilities. Its activities are underpinned by strong risk management practices and by powerful technology and operational excellence. Its exceptional teams have diverse global backgrounds and decades of experience, and are driven by a highly collaborative culture, across products and competencies.

In 2024, Engelhart acquired Trailstone, a global energy trading and technology company. The acquisition provides Engelhart with new expertise, analytics and proprietary technology which is used to provide risk management and optimisation services to manage the intermittency of renewable power generation for its client base. The acquisition also expanded Engelhart‚Äôs capabilities into physical natural gas across North America.

Its talented and experienced individuals work together according to its four company values: be bold, be collaborative, be proactive, be your best.

Software Engineer, Python

About the Role

We are looking for an experienced back-end Python software engineer to join our growing London office. This role will join the Trading & Commercial Development Team, developing best in class back-end services and microservices for our renewables trading platform, with Python.

The team is building a world-class product to help us scale and bring renewables to many more power markets in the world, while trading many more smaller electricity assets. This project is expanding at pace, following Trailstone‚Äôs merger with Engelhart Commodities Trading Partners. As a result, this role will be joining an international team with tangible impact on our platform's success from day one.

This will be a full-time role, owning the following responsibilities:


Design, develop and maintain containerised services for auction-based renewables trading.
Work in a cross-functional team with engineers, business analysts, traders, data engineers and data scientists.
Stay up to date with the latest trends in technology and continuously improve our code base, systems, and processes.
Mentor junior members in the team by emphasising code quality and conducting pull requests and code reviews.


About You

This person will be a seasoned developer, experienced working with time-sensitive hybrid-cloud systems, in order to deliver immediate impact to our growing renewables trading platform. This person will be working closely with commercial stakeholders on a regular basis, so experience collaborating with non-technical staff will help set someone up for success.

We believe the following essential skills & experiences will best set someone up for success in this role, therefore will be prioritising the following:


Significant relevant Python experience.
Strong knowledge of object-oriented, functional and asynchronous programming and design patterns.
Substantial SQL experience and understanding of relational database fundamentals.
A passion for delivering clean code and working with a test-driven mindset.
An appreciation of working in a hybrid-cloud and container-driven architecture (partly on-premise and partly AWS).
Domain knowledge in the energy or financial sector is highly desirable.
Desirable, but not essential: Experience developing services in C#




Our Tech Stack

Our tech stack includes Python (FastAPI, Pandas), AWS (ECS, Aurora), Redis, Docker, Atlassian (Jira, Bitbucket), SQL Server, C# and more.

Locations

This role can be based in either our Berlin or our London office, following the preference of the individual. You can find our office addresses on our website.

We believe in inclusivity and are therefore dedicated to ensuring all employees ‚Äì across gender identity, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, life experience, background and more ‚Äì feel welcome and included in the company. We promote diversity because we believe it is essential to our ability to think holistically.

Title: Founding AI Engineer
Description:
We‚Äôre offering a unique opportunity to join our startup as a Founding AI Engineer. If you are excited to work at the forefront of generative AI and be part of building a successful company from the very beginning, we have the perfect position for you üòé

As one of our first team members, you‚Äôll play a key role in developing a truly innovative AI product leveraging an agentic AI workflow including custom LLMs and RAG. The position comes with a competitive salary and an attractive equity share (VSOP), giving you a stake in the success of the startup.

About Zapdeck

Consultants worldwide spend millions of hours every day creating presentations. Zapdeck is set to revolutionize this task with powerful AI software that empowers users to create professionally designed presentations in minutes.

At the heart of Zapdeck is an innovative agentic AI technology‚Äîthe first capable of converting text directly into professional slide designs. Our product features an intuitive editor that enables seamless collaboration, helps users craft cohesive storylines, and transforms them into polished slides ready for export.

The presentation creation industry is a multi-billion-dollar market undergoing significant disruption due to advancements in generative AI. Zapdeck has secured substantial pre-seed funding and is building partnerships with leading companies in the industry. We are now on track to becoming one of Germany's leading AI start-ups.

You will be part of a team with extensive experience. Our co-founder / CEO Frederik is a former consultant at BCG and our co-founder / CTO Riccardo is the former technical CPO of InsurTech startup INZMO.

Tasks


Develop AI features: Develop our agentic AI workflow including fine-tuning open source LLMs and implementing RAG.
Evolve backend: Develop our AI backend based on Python following clean code practices and enterprise-level architectural design patterns.
Manage data and models: Collect and preprocess data, set up RLHF, oversee model version control and performance monitoring.
Drive innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI and contribute to our AI and product strategy to maintain the competitive edge.



Requirements

Professional requirements


2‚Äì4 years of experience in AI/ML development, with hands-on expertise in training and fine-tuning ML models, including LLMs.
Solid experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face, and strong skills in Python.
Experience in collecting, preprocessing, and managing data pipelines for training, with knowledge of tools like pandas or NumPy and REST APIs.
Bonus: Familiarity with versioning, deployment, and monitoring of ML models in production environments, incl. managing AI related cloud infrastructure.
Bonus: Experience with Gen AI applications in media and design, with AI-powered enterprise software, or agentic AI solutions.



Other Requirements


Residency and valid work authorization in Germany, preferably Berlin.
Fluency in English, our main business language
Availability to start within a short time frame (e.g., within 1 month)



Benefits


Attractive package of a monthly salary and VSOP shares in a fast-growing AI startup that could be worth several million in a few years.
Opportunity to work independently and creatively in a young and ambitious team team and see the direct impact of your work.
Hybrid working model with the option to work from home or from our office in Berlin Mitte, and flexible working hours.
Possibility to build your own team and take on more responsibility in a managerial role in a short space of time.
Regular team events as well as free snacks and drinks in our office Berlin Mitte :)



Join us to create a disruptive AI product and shape a globally successful company üöÄ
Show more

We‚Äôre offering a unique opportunity to join our startup as a Founding AI Engineer. If you are excited to work at the forefront of generative AI and be part of building a successful company from the very beginning, we have the perfect position for you üòé

As one of our first team members, you‚Äôll play a key role in developing a truly innovative AI product leveraging an agentic AI workflow including custom LLMs and RAG. The position comes with a competitive salary and an attractive equity share (VSOP), giving you a stake in the success of the startup.

About Zapdeck

Consultants worldwide spend millions of hours every day creating presentations. Zapdeck is set to revolutionize this task with powerful AI software that empowers users to create professionally designed presentations in minutes.

At the heart of Zapdeck is an innovative agentic AI technology‚Äîthe first capable of converting text directly into professional slide designs. Our product features an intuitive editor that enables seamless collaboration, helps users craft cohesive storylines, and transforms them into polished slides ready for export.

The presentation creation industry is a multi-billion-dollar market undergoing significant disruption due to advancements in generative AI. Zapdeck has secured substantial pre-seed funding and is building partnerships with leading companies in the industry. We are now on track to becoming one of Germany's leading AI start-ups.

You will be part of a team with extensive experience. Our co-founder / CEO Frederik is a former consultant at BCG and our co-founder / CTO Riccardo is the former technical CPO of InsurTech startup INZMO.

Tasks

  • Develop AI features: Develop our agentic AI workflow including fine-tuning open source LLMs and implementing RAG.
  • Evolve backend: Develop our AI backend based on Python following clean code practices and enterprise-level architectural design patterns.
  • Manage data and models: Collect and preprocess data, set up RLHF, oversee model version control and performance monitoring.
  • Drive innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI and contribute to our AI and product strategy to maintain the competitive edge.


Requirements

Professional requirements

  • 2‚Äì4 years of experience in AI/ML development, with hands-on expertise in training and fine-tuning ML models, including LLMs.
  • Solid experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face, and strong skills in Python.
  • Experience in collecting, preprocessing, and managing data pipelines for training, with knowledge of tools like pandas or NumPy and REST APIs.
  • Bonus: Familiarity with versioning, deployment, and monitoring of ML models in production environments, incl. managing AI related cloud infrastructure.
  • Bonus: Experience with Gen AI applications in media and design, with AI-powered enterprise software, or agentic AI solutions.


Other Requirements

  • Residency and valid work authorization in Germany, preferably Berlin.
  • Fluency in English, our main business language
  • Availability to start within a short time frame (e.g., within 1 month)


Benefits

  • Attractive package of a monthly salary and VSOP shares in a fast-growing AI startup that could be worth several million in a few years.
  • Opportunity to work independently and creatively in a young and ambitious team team and see the direct impact of your work.
  • Hybrid working model with the option to work from home or from our office in Berlin Mitte, and flexible working hours.
  • Possibility to build your own team and take on more responsibility in a managerial role in a short space of time.
  • Regular team events as well as free snacks and drinks in our office Berlin Mitte :)


Join us to create a disruptive AI product and shape a globally successful company üöÄ

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Job: Senior Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Berlin/Hybrid

Salary: ‚Ç¨90,000-‚Ç¨100,000

Interview process: 3 Stages, 1 x 30 minute initial call, 1 x take home GenAI task, 1 x Deep technical interview to present task and meet team.




We're excited to bring you this role for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer for a client of ours in Berlin. The team we're hiring for is a leading team in AI, specializing in GenAI and LLMs. They have a proven track record of success, having deployed Transformers-based models in production for over 5 years and launched a groundbreaking GenAI-powered chatbot in 2024.

They leverage a large dataset to drive innovation and continuously improve their solutions.




Tech Stack: Python, PyTorch, AWS, Docker, and cutting-edge foundation models like LLaMA, GPT, and BERT.




Your Tasks

Develop and deploy cutting-edge GenAI solutions, including LLMs for various applications.
Fine-tune and adapt existing LLMs to specific business needs.
Research and implement novel LLM architectures and training techniques.
Drive innovation across the product lifecycle, leveraging the power of GenAI.




Your Profile

4 + years of experience working with NLPs and GenAI, with hands-on experience with LLMs (e.g., LLaMA, GPT, BERT).
Expertise in Python, cloud (AWS), and deep learning frameworks (PyTorch).
Proven ability to develop and deploy production-level LLM applications.
Passion for developing and deploying impactful AI solutions.
Strong German language skills

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Generative AI & Evaluations Platform (f/m/d)*
Description:
Your Mission

As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer (f/m/d)*, you will work on Parloa‚Äôs Experimentation and Evaluation Platform and the models and software that power our generative AI products. You will work directly with product engineering and sales teams to help them evaluate and improve our AI Agents and the models that power them. You‚Äôll build services that enable customers to evaluate AI Agents and run experiments. You‚Äôll collaborate with Data Scientists to research and develop new product features - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tunning STT models on new languages and accents.

You‚Äôll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa‚Äôs ML Platforms and Machine Learning models. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will


Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
Collaborate with product engineering and sales to shape requirements and our product vision leveraging AI and LLMs in line with customer needs
Execute machine learning projects end-to-end: understanding user-facing requirements, data gathering and transformation, exploratory data analysis, model productionization, maintenance and support, continuous improvement
Shape our ML platform (ML / LLM Ops) by defining the requirements and/or designing and implementing parts of it in collaboration with our data platform and DevOps teams


Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table


7+ years of experience as a machine learning engineer
Experience working with NLP, LLMs and information retrieval; experience with LLMs in a production environment is a strong plus
Strong proficiency in Python
Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
Strong spoken and written communication skills in English


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?


Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
Attractive compensation package
Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity


Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call ‚Üí Hiring Manager Interview ‚Üí Technical Stage (Coding Session) + Machine Learning (Case Study) ‚Üí Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa‚Äôs voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that‚Äôs revolutionizing an entire industry. We‚Äôre passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we‚Äôre expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.


We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.

Title: Senior ML Engineer ‚Äì Speech/Audio (TTS / STT)
Description:
This is a fully remote role, allowing you to work from anywhere in the world.

About Synthflow

At Synthflow we‚Äôre building the easiest way for businesses to create AI-powered phone agents. No coding, no fuss‚Äîjust smarter automation. We‚Äôre passionate about delivering the future of voice technology with lightning-fast, scalable solutions. It‚Äôs an exciting time at Synthflow: we‚Äôre early, fast-growing, and laser-focused on impact. Join us to do the best work of your career while helping businesses thrive.

About The Role

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build the next generation of AI-powered speech tools. In this role, you will focus on the design, development, and optimization of cutting-edge TTS and STT models. Your work will play a crucial role in enhancing the performance, naturalness, and accuracy of our speech solutions, directly impacting the user experience.

Your responsibilities will include:


Architect and develop state-of-the-art machine learning models for TTS and STT applications.
Lead the training, fine-tuning, and optimization processes to ensure our speech models achieve top-tier performance.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate these technologies into scalable and robust products.
Drive innovation by staying updated with the latest industry trends and research in speech technologies.
Collaborate with NLP researchers and Software Engineers for the integration of new speech processing algorithms.


Who you are:


You have a solid background in speech technologies with a strong focus on TTS and STT.
You have over 3 years of practical experience in applying machine learning to develop and optimize speech processing systems.
You are proficient in Python and familiar with modern ML frameworks and tools.
You are a problem solver with a keen analytical mind, capable of tackling complex challenges in a dynamic environment.


Beyond the basics:


Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in speech technology, specifically in developing TTS and STT systems.
Strong software development skills and experience with machine learning model implementation.
Demonstrated capability in delivering effective solutions in speech processing.


What We Offer:


Autonomy at speed: High-ownership roles in a fast-moving startup.
Remote-first flexibility: Contribute from anywhere, on your schedule.
Cutting-edge technology: Work on what interests you most.
Career growth: Scale your impact as the company grows.
Rewarding package: Competitive pay, equity options, and comprehensive benefits that reflect your skills and experience.

  • You are proficient in Python and familiar with modern ML frameworks and tools.
  • You are a problem solver with a keen analytical mind, capable of tackling complex challenges in a dynamic environment.

Beyond the basics:

  • Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
  • At least 3 years of hands-on experience in speech technology, specifically in developing TTS and STT systems.
  • Strong software development skills and experience with machine learning model implementation.
  • Demonstrated capability in delivering effective solutions in speech processing.

What We Offer:

  • Autonomy at speed: High-ownership roles in a fast-moving startup.
  • Remote-first flexibility: Contribute from anywhere, on your schedule.
  • Cutting-edge technology: Work on what interests you most.
  • Career growth: Scale your impact as the company grows.
  • Rewarding package: Competitive pay, equity options, and comprehensive benefits that reflect your skills and experience.

Title: Data Scientist / AI Engineer (m/f/d)
Description:
WELCOME TO BASF

Our Data Analytics & AI team is pivotal in developing data-driven solutions across our Global Safety, Toxicology, and Intellectual Property units. We leverage data to solve complex problems and enhance operational efficiency. By joining us, you'll be part of a forward-thinking team that fosters innovation and data-driven decision-making, ensuring we remain at the cutting edge of digital transformation.


What You Can Expect

As a Data Scientist/AI Engineer within the Data Analytics & AI Team, you are instrumental in optimizing, implementing, and operationalizing AI use cases aligned with the corporate AI strategy. You collaborate with cross-functional teams across Global Safety, Toxicology, and Intellectual Property units to identify AI opportunities and drive their implementation and adoption.


Your responsibilities include developing and deploying AI models to solve complex business challenges, ensuring they are scalable and efficient.
You work with large datasets from various sources, applying advanced analytics techniques to extract meaningful insights.
Additionally, you create and maintain AI-driven solutions that enhance decision-making processes and operational efficiency.
Presenting your findings and recommendations to stakeholders is a key part of your role, ensuring alignment with our department's strategic objectives.




What You Offer


master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field, ideally combined with chemistry or biology
advanced knowledge in AI model development, including domain adaptation methods and integration into existing applications
basic understanding of intellectual property (IP) and regulatory considerations in the chemical industry
proficiency in Python and experience with frameworks such as pandas, numpy, scikit-learn, PyTorch, LangChain, LangGraph, and Hugging Face
familiarity with generative AI models, prompt engineering, and experience in developing Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and AI agent systems
excellent communication skills in English, with proficiency in German as a plus




What We Offer


Gross annual salary (full-time): 46.000 - 50.000 ‚Ç¨, depending on qualification and work experience, 55.000 - 59.000 ‚Ç¨ possible with correspondingly higher qualifications.
In addition, you can expect a bonus dependent on the company's success as well as individual performance.
Flexible working hours so that you can organize your working and private life according to your needs.
Work mobile from other EU countries for up to six weeks.
Location-independent work models with defined days of presence in Berlin and place of residence in Germany.




How To Reach Us


Amelie Solveig Br√ºggen (Talent Acquisition), amelie.brueggen@basf.com, will be happy to answer your questions for this position
You can also reach our recruiting team: here
First information about our application process can be found: here




About Us

As an international service hub, the BASF Services Europe GmbH bundles a wide range of services for the BASF Group throughout Europe. In the heart of Berlin, we combine expertise in the areas of finance, HR, supply chain, procurement, product safety and IT. We focus on digital and customer-focused solutions, to create services for future. Learn more about us and our career opportunities at basf.com/servicehub-berlin.

Diversity is our greatest strength!

Become a part of our winning formula for success and develop the future with us - in a global team that embraces inclusion and equal opportunities irrespective of gender, age, origin, sexual orientation, disability or belief.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Who We are

We are a fast-growing Hr tech startup in Italy. Skillvue is a Skill AI Assessment platform (SaaS) to hire top-skilled candidates and measure employee skill, culture, and leadership at scale to upskill and grow the workforce by leveraging AI. We recently raised 2.5 M from top VC investors such as Italian Founders Fund, 14 Peaks, Berlusconi Family Office, Kfund, Orbita Verticale. In today's evolving labour market, skills have become the top priority for HR departments, and their importance will only continue to grow. Our platform enables companies to conduct Skill AI Assessments for both external and internal hiring, as well as targeted evaluations across their entire workforce. We work with incredible enterprise companies such as Unicredit, Credem, Loro Piana, Carrefour and many others.




About the Role:

We're on the cutting edge of revolutionizing Skillvue skill assessment tools and we're looking for an experienced full stack ML engineer to join our team! You'll work on some of the most exciting AI projects under our lead AI psychometrician. Together, you'll design, finetune, deploy, optimize, and upgrade our AI assessment system through GenAI in a agile manner.

You'll also actively engage in researching the latest developments in AI-driven behavioral science and explore its potential utility to psychological assessment.




About you:

A background in computational-enabled or data science disciplines is required
A background in a subdiscipline of behavioral science will be regarded as a significant advantage
5+ years of research or practical experience in machine or deep learning, with a focus on natural language processing and large language modeling
3+ years of experience in training and deploying GenAI in a software system, whether on-cloud or in-premise.
Experience of fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) is required.
Additional experience in retrieval augmented generation (RAG) is preferred.
The ability to design and deploy real-time GenAI-based conversational AI agents is favored.
Experience in ML-Op pipeline, from data preprocessing to model deployment
Experience in building local API web service via LangChain or llama.cpp




About your skills:

Fluency in programming languages, including Python and JavaScript.
Knowledge in database management such as with mySQL
Familiar with online platform such as HuggingFace, AWS
Knowledge in designing a Chatbot web interface with customizable prompts, accessing external websites (URLs), vector databases and other sources
Fluency in English (C1)




What We Offer:

Competitive salary based on your experience
Real Impact: Your code will directly influence the recruitment, promotion, and mobilization of thousands of people, making a tangible difference in their careers
Full Remote: Our HQ is based in Milan, but you can work remotely
Stock Options: Potential to participate in our stock option plan

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Campaigns
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Data Scientist to help us improve Bolt‚Äôs Campaigns

About Us

Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa, with over 150 million customers in 50+ countries. We‚Äôre a global team of more than 100 nationalities joined on a common mission ‚Äì to make cities for people, not cars. And we need you to make it happen!

About The Role

You will be building models for predicting the probability of the user booking under specific circumstances. You will work on customer segmentation: discover rider, driver, and eater segments for efficient campaign targeting. As a Data Scientist, you will be developing a system for automating promo campaigns setup and scaling it for millions of Bolt customers. You will be engaged in designing optimal experimental setup for comparing different campaigns targeting methodologies and user behavior dynamics. You will work on prioritising user acquisition channels using analytical and machine learning approaches.

Your daily adventures will include:


Machine learning and statistical model development and its deployment into a production environment)
Studying historical user behaviour and building models for optimal users‚Äô discount allocation
Developing a system for automating regular promo campaign setups)
Setting up A/B tests, collecting, interpreting its results, and communicating to stakeholders)
Working with a technical stack consisting of Python, Docker, Presto, SageMaker, Airflow)
Collaborating with data analysts, data scientists, product managers, and software engineers in feature teams )



About you:


Industry experience in data science and machine learning (4+ years recommended), with deep knowledge of statistics, probability, and causal inference
Proficient in setting A/B tests and interpreting results, with a strong understanding of statistical hypothesis testing
Track record of deploying models to production and effectively measuring their impact
Experience in writing complex SQL queries and mapping business/product problems to data science frameworks
Strong product thinking and problem-solving skills, with the ability to communicate, persuade, and collaborate effectively
Proactive, self-driven mindset, able to take initiative with minimal supervision and work well in a team



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don‚Äôt tick every box, please consider applying if you feel you‚Äôre the kind of person described above!

Why you‚Äôll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode with a minimum of 2 days in the office each week to foster strong connections and teamwork.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location and role.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
UMATR are proud to be partnered with a software business looking to hire a talented Data Scientist to join their team. In this role, you‚Äôll be diving deep into data to solve key business challenges, from identifying problem areas and designing experiments to driving impactful decision-making. Unlike traditional analytics roles, this position offers you the chance to create real, actionable insights that lead to change.




What You‚Äôll Do:

Tackle Complex Problems: Use data to identify issues and design solutions that drive business results.
Experiment & Influence: Design experiments, run analyses, and influence key business decisions with your insights.
Work on Real-Time, High-Impact Data: Work with massive geolocational and temporal data in real time, across multiple cities with unique dynamics.
Collaboration & Ownership: You won‚Äôt just analyse data‚Äîyou‚Äôll be a key player, driving action and shaping business strategy from the frontlines.




What We Offer:

Challenging & Impactful Work: Tackle complex data problems while building the future of the online delivery space. Our work spans real-time data, varied city dynamics, and cross-functional collaboration.
A Unique Company Culture: We believe in doing common things uncommonly well, thinking big but staying humble, and treating others with kindness and respect.




What We‚Äôre Looking For:

Educational Background: A degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
Experience: 4-5+ years in a data science or analytics role within an industry or research setting.
Technical Skills: Expertise in statistical analysis (hypothesis testing, experimentation, causal inference) using Python, R, or similar tools.
SQL Proficiency: Skilled at writing structured, efficient SQL queries to work with large data sets.
Visualisation & Dashboards: Experience creating clear and intuitive data visualisations and dashboards that influence business decisions, using tools like Tableau, Mixpanel, Looker, or similar.
Problem-Solving Mindset: A relentless drive to find new ideas and data sources, with a systematic, data-driven approach to tackling ambiguous challenges.
Fluency in both English and German

Title: Data Scientist, Traveler Data Products
Description:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, people from all over the world have booked more than 150 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 800 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team mission

At GetYourGuide (GYG), we're looking for a passionate Data Scientist to join our Traveler Data Products Team. In this role, you'll have the opportunity to make a significant impact on our product and our customers' experiences. You'll work with a vast and diverse set of structured and unstructured data, powering various data products such as search, recommendations, SEM, and incentives. Our team has touchpoints across the business, developing end-to-end solutions that directly contribute to creating memorable travel experiences for people around the world.

Join the Traveler Data Products Team, where we are passionate about creating data-driven solutions that empower travelers to discover and connect with the perfect experiences. Our mission is to make our vast inventory accessible and relevant by tailoring it to individual interests, extracting valuable insights from product descriptions, and customizing page layouts to meet our users' unique needs. We are also at the forefront of exploring how Large Language Models (LLMs) can accelerate the discovery of relevant products, ensuring a seamless and enriching customer journey.

As a valued member of our inclusive and dynamic team, you will collaborate closely with fellow Data Scientists and MLOps Engineers, continuously innovating to enhance the relevance and personalization of the products we display. Together, we strive to make every travel experience unforgettable.

You Will


Develop innovative data products that not only delight our customers but also drive the success of our company.
Take full ownership of projects, guiding them from the initial business challenge to the deployment of production code. This includes:
Contribute to the development of our machine learning infrastructure and help establish best practices that will shape our future.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, leveraging your unique perspective to solve complex and exciting problems.
Support the continuous improvement and growth of our team, including participating in recruiting efforts to bring in new talent.


Who You Are

Ideal candidates will have experience in most of the following areas:


Machine Learning Familiarity with regressors, classifiers, and recommender systems. A solid understanding of ML techniques and their practical applications. Experience deploying ML models in production is a plus.
Software Engineering Proficiency in Python. Knowledge of distributed machine learning and computing frameworks (e.g., Spark) is beneficial.
Analytics Ability to transform data into actionable insights. Experience with hypothesis testing and proficiency in analytics tools (e.g., pandas, R) and SQL.
Business Acumen Applied experience in a business environment, demonstrating result-driven work.
Academic Background An advanced degree in a quantitative field or equivalent practical experience.
Communication Strong skills in explaining complex concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.


We value potential and enthusiasm as much as experience. If you are passionate about data science and eager to learn, we encourage you to apply, even if you don't meet all the criteria listed above.

How We Set You Up For Success


Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences
A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
English-speaking office environment
Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
Well-stocked kitchen and team-building events like our famous pizza & beer Fridays
GetYourGuide vouchers and free German lessons
Save on transportation costs with discounted public transportation tickets
Support your loved ones with generous maternity and paternity leave policies
Relocation assistance if needed


And more...

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.

Description:

Bei Dataciders ixto erwartet Dich ein sehr gutes teamorientiertes Betriebsklima und eine angenehme Arbeitsatmosph√§re mit einem motivierten, vielseitigen Team aus unterschiedlichen Bereichen wie Informationstechnik, Wirtschaftswissenschaften, uvm. DATA SCIENCE DEVELOPER (M/W/D)

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
KAYAK, part of Booking Holdings (NASDAQ: BKNG), is the world‚Äôs leading travel search engine. With billions of queries across our platforms, we help people find their perfect flight, stay, rental car and vacation package. We‚Äôre also transforming business travel with a new corporate travel solution, KAYAK for Business.

As an employee of KAYAK, you will be part of a travel company that operates a portfolio of global metasearch brands including momondo, Cheapflights and HotelsCombined, among others. From start-up to industry leader, innovation is in our DNA and every employee has an opportunity to make their mark. Our focus is on building the best travel search engine to make it easier for everyone to experience the world.

The Marketing Measurement team's mission is to improve KAYAK's ability to measure the efficiency of marketing efforts. This role works closely with marketing leaders to make better data-informed strategic marketing decisions.

As a Senior Data Scientist on this team, you will have the opportunity to develop the frameworks and roadmaps to tackle marketing measurement challenges in an efficient way, work with the stakeholders to align on priorities, and closely work your team to build the robust measurement and experimentation solutions!

In this role, you will:



Manage into end to end experimentation from formulating hypotheses, experiment design to collecting right data, doing power analysis to finally then implementing and analyzing experiment results
Support in the initiatives towards building a robust framework for efficiently creating and evaluating creative, bidding and landing page experiments
Develop new models and advanced analytics techniques to measure and optimize the marketing spend in a robust manner
Support the development of less senior scientists, collaborates with team members to assure timely delivery of high-quality work
Build standardized and scalable solutions, and lead from front in setting up the best practices



Please apply if you have:



Advanced degree (Masters, PhD) in Data Science, Statistics or a related field.
Extensive experience with data manipulation and extraction using relational databases (SQL)
Ability to write high quality, scalable, maintainable code (Python, R)
Strong story-telling and presentation skills to understand and communicate in the language of business partners, mostly within Marketing
Strong foundation in experimentation methods and causal inference techniques
Experienced in marketing science measurement methodologies like Causal impact, geo-lift on Google, and Marketing mix models
Proactive work style, needing minimal guidance and demonstrating good judgment
Has a keen sense of success criteria and demonstrates success through end-to-end QA. Independently adheres to strong testing and validation principles
Passionate about large data sets in marketing, finance, and economics. Skilled in paid marketing data, time-series analysis, econometrics, and regression models



Benefits:



Work from (almost) anywhere for up to 20 days per year
Focus on mental health and well-being:

Company-paid therapy sessions through SpringHealth
Company-paid subscription to HeadSpace
Company-wide week off a year - the whole team fully recharges (and returns without a pile-up of work!)
No meeting Fridays

Paid parental leave
Generous paid vacation + time off for your birthday
Paid volunteer time
Focus on your career growth:

Development Dollars
Leadership development
Access to thousand of on-demand e-learnings

Travel Discounts
Employee Resource Groups
6 weeks paid vacation
Free lunch 2 days per week
Pension plan contributions
Public transportation subsidies
Bike leasing program
Monthly social events, massages, Thursday happy hours, sports teams
An awesome office in Friedrichshain, Berlin


Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

At OpenTable/KAYAK, we aspire to be a workplace that fosters inclusion and reflects the diverse communities we serve. Hiring people with different backgrounds and perspectives is critical to innovation and to how we deliver great experiences for our users, partners, and teams. We strive to be an open and welcoming environment so that no matter who you are, you can be yourself.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform job responsibilities, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation(s).

Title: Founding AI Engineer
Description:
We‚Äôre offering a unique opportunity to join our startup as a Founding AI Engineer. If you are excited to work at the forefront of generative AI and be part of building a successful company from the very beginning, we have the perfect position for you üòé

As one of our first team members, you‚Äôll play a key role in developing a truly innovative AI product leveraging an agentic AI workflow including custom LLMs and RAG. The position comes with a competitive salary and an attractive equity share (VSOP), giving you a stake in the success of the startup.

About Zapdeck

Consultants worldwide spend millions of hours every day creating presentations. Zapdeck is set to revolutionize this task with powerful AI software that empowers users to create professionally designed presentations in minutes.

At the heart of Zapdeck is an innovative agentic AI technology‚Äîthe first capable of converting text directly into professional slide designs. Our product features an intuitive editor that enables seamless collaboration, helps users craft cohesive storylines, and transforms them into polished slides ready for export.

The presentation creation industry is a multi-billion-dollar market undergoing significant disruption due to advancements in generative AI. Zapdeck has secured substantial pre-seed funding and is building partnerships with leading companies in the industry. We are now on track to becoming one of Germany's leading AI start-ups.

You will be part of a team with extensive experience. Our co-founder / CEO Frederik is a former consultant at BCG and our co-founder / CTO Riccardo is the former technical CPO of InsurTech startup INZMO.

Tasks


Develop AI features: Develop our agentic AI workflow including fine-tuning open source LLMs and implementing RAG.
Evolve backend: Develop our AI backend based on Python following clean code practices and enterprise-level architectural design patterns.
Manage data and models: Collect and preprocess data, set up RLHF, oversee model version control and performance monitoring.
Drive innovation: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI and contribute to our AI and product strategy to maintain the competitive edge.



Requirements

Professional requirements


2‚Äì4 years of experience in AI/ML development, with hands-on expertise in training and fine-tuning ML models, including LLMs.
Solid experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face, and strong skills in Python.
Experience in collecting, preprocessing, and managing data pipelines for training, with knowledge of tools like pandas or NumPy and REST APIs.
Bonus: Familiarity with versioning, deployment, and monitoring of ML models in production environments, incl. managing AI related cloud infrastructure.
Bonus: Experience with Gen AI applications in media and design, with AI-powered enterprise software, or agentic AI solutions.



Other Requirements


Residency and valid work authorization in Germany, preferably Berlin.
Fluency in English, our main business language
Availability to start within a short time frame (e.g., within 1 month)



Benefits


Attractive package of a monthly salary and VSOP shares in a fast-growing AI startup that could be worth several million in a few years.
Opportunity to work independently and creatively in a young and ambitious team team and see the direct impact of your work.
Hybrid working model with the option to work from home or from our office in Berlin Mitte, and flexible working hours.
Possibility to build your own team and take on more responsibility in a managerial role in a short space of time.
Regular team events as well as free snacks and drinks in our office Berlin Mitte :)



Join us to create a disruptive AI product and shape a globally successful company üöÄ

Title: Senior Data Scientist, Delivery
Description:
Join our Delivery Data Science team build advanced models, and help shape the future of online services while improving user experiences for millions worldwide.

About Us

With over 200 million customers in 50+ countries, Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa. And it's all thanks to our people.

We believe in creating an inclusive environment where everyone is welcome, regardless of race, colour, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, or disability.

Our ultimate goal is to make cities for people, not cars, and we need your help to achieve this mission!

About The Role

You will be building models to estimate the food delivery time at various stages of the order, such as before and after the order has been accepted. You will also build complex ranking pipelines for our textual search and recommendation engines, using optimization techniques for dispatching and demand/supply balancing to minimize the delivery time of our orders.

Main tasks and responsibilities:


Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including Data Analysts, Data Egineers, Product Managers, and Software Engineers, to gain a deep understanding of business needs and create end-to-end technical solutions for them.
Deploying and validating solutions for millions of users, enabling fast feedback and measurable added value to customers.
Rapidly deploying models to production environments using AWS and internal machine learning platforms, leveraging a toolkit that includes Python, Spark, Presto, Docker, SageMaker, and Airflow for efficient data processing and model deployment.
Engaging in regular knowledge exchange with Data Scientists across all seniority levels, fostering a collaborative environment that promotes learning and innovation.
Solving real-world problems on a wide variety of tasks, such as ranking, textual search, recommendation, user clustering, pricing, delivery time estimation, dispatching, and demand/supply balancing.
Applying the most advanced techniques, such as deep learning, gradient boosting, causal inference, mathematical optimization, dimensionality reduction, time series forecasting, and more.



About you:


You have 5 years of experience in Data Science and Machine Learning, ideally in product development within a technology-focused company.
You‚Äôre skilled in Python programming, leveraging key libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and OR-tools for data analysis and modelling, with practical experience in statistical hypothesis testing that allows you to independently identify problems, explore trends, and discover opportunities through data-driven methods.
You have a proactive mindset, a willingness to take initiative and work with little supervision, and enthusiasm for collaborating with different roles in product, analytics, and engineering to identify problems, explore trends, and discover growth opportunities.
You exhibit excellent teamwork and strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written, enabling clear collaboration and knowledge-sharing.
You have hands-on experience in building ML systems from end to end, including testing, monitoring, scaling, and measuring the impact.



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you don‚Äôt tick every box, please consider applying!

Why you‚Äôll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50+ countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode with a minimum of 3 days in the office each week to foster strong connections and teamwork.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location and role.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
üåü Exciting Opportunity: Senior Data Scientist (Hybrid - Berlin) üåü

What You‚Äôll Do

Title: Senior Data Scientist - Insights (Subscription Experience) ƒ± Paid relocation to Barcelona
Description:
We power people's progress.

At Preply, we‚Äôre all about creating life-changing learning experiences. We help people discover the magic of the perfect tutor, craft a personalized learning journey, and stay motivated to keep growing. Our approach is human-led, tech-enabled - and it‚Äôs creating real impact. So far, 90,000 tutors have delivered over 20 million lessons to learners in more than 175 countries. Every Preply lesson sparks change, fuels ambition, and drives progress that matters.




Meet the team!

At Preply, data is at the heart of every decision we make. We run hundreds of A/B tests to continually optimize our product, each with its own analytical and tracking challenges. The complexity of our subscription model, along with the unique dynamics of tutor-learner interactions, offer an exciting opportunity for those looking to make real impact.




As a Senior Data Scientist for the Subscription Experience (SubX) team, you will be a key player in shaping the future of our subscription product and driving our monetization strategy forward. Embedded within a cross-functional squad, you‚Äôll collaborate closely with product managers, tech leads, designers, and other key stakeholders to deliver data-driven insights that shape business decisions. Your work will guide the evolution of the subscription model, helping us better understand user behaviors, optimize pricing strategies, improve retention and explore new opportunities to improve the value we offer to learners and tutors alike.




Our Data Team is dedicated to empowering top-quality decision-making. Do you want to know how? Visit our Tech Radar to learn about the technologies we use at Preply!




What You‚Äôll Be Doing

Develop a deep understanding of the dynamics of our subscription model, including user behavior, pricing strategies and the economics of Preply‚Äôs marketplace.
Focus on the continuous improvement of our subscription product by gathering and analyzing data to uncover valuable insights that will shape product evolution and strategy.
Analyze customer behavior and product usage, improve our understanding of what drives retention and effectively communicate findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders to drive informed decision-making.
Quantify and model the impact of new product features and initiatives, identifying growth opportunities and contributing to the prioritization of our product roadmap.
Help define key performance indicators, tracking events, and engagement metrics that align with business goals and product improvements.
Design, execute, and evaluate large-scale experiments to test new ideas and measure their effectiveness in driving business outcomes.
Build strong relationships with data and technical leaders to foster collaboration and drive cross-team initiatives.




What You Need To Succeed

Experience in data analytics working with product teams, experimenting and uncovering opportunities for product optimization.
Experience designing and analyzing A/B tests with a strong grasp of relevant statistical concepts.
Strong understanding of data analysis concepts such as conversion, LTV, cohort analysis, retention, etc.
Proficiency in one or more programming languages (e.g., SQL, Python), with the ability to write efficient and scalable code.
Ability to create clear, insightful reports and dashboards.
Curiosity, problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, as well as the ability to proactively identify and address challenges.
Ability to craft compelling stories with data and communicate complex insights in a clear and engaging way, driving change among diverse stakeholders.
Interest in the bigger picture, feeling excited to impact the product roadmap and strategy.




Nice To Have

Experience with subscription models or product monetization strategies.
Background in 2-sided marketplaces or digital businesses (B2B, B2C, B2B2C).
Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker, Power BI).
Experience with product analytics tools (e.g. Amplitude, Mixpanel, Heap).
Familiarity with machine learning techniques and how they can be applied to enhance user behavior predictions or product recommendations.
Master's degree or PhD in a quantitative field.
Previous experience in mentoring or coaching others.




Why You‚Äôll Love It At Preply

An open, collaborative, dynamic and diverse culture;
A generous monthly allowance for lessons on Preply.com, Learning & Development budget and time off for your self-development;
A competitive financial package with equity, leave allowance and health insurance;
Not in Barcelona? We offer an attractive relocation package to join us in our Preply Barcelona Hub
Access to free mental health support platforms;
Access to Gympass-partnered wellness and gym centers throughout Spain to promote and support well-being and physical health;
The opportunity to unlock the potential of learners and tutors through language learning and teaching in 175 countries (and counting!).




Our Principles

Care to change the world - We are passionate about our work and care deeply about its impact to be life changing.
We do it for learners - For both Preply and tutors, learners are why we do what we do. Every day we focus on empowering tutors to deliver an exceptional learning experience.
Keep perfecting - To create an outstanding customer experience, we focus on simplicity, smoothness, and enjoyment, continually perfecting it as every detail matters.
Now is the time - In a fast-paced world, it matters how quickly we act. Now is the time to make great things happen.
Disciplined execution - What makes us disciplined is the excellence in our execution. We set clear goals, focus on what matters, and utilize our resources efficiently.
Dive deep - We leverage business acumen and curiosity to investigate disparities between numbers and stories, unlocking meaningful insights to guide our decisions.
Growth mindset - We proactively seek growth opportunities and believe today's best performance becomes tomorrow's starting point. We humbly embrace feedback and learn from setbacks.
Raise the bar - We raise our performance standards continuously, alongside each new hire and promotion. We build diverse and high-performing teams that can make a real difference.
Challenge, disagree and commit - We value open and candid communication, even when we don‚Äôt fully agree. We speak our minds, challenge when necessary, and fully commit to decisions once made.
One Preply - We prioritize collaboration, inclusion, and the success of our team over personal ambitions. Together, we support and celebrate each other's progress.




Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Preply is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment where people from all backgrounds can thrive. Different opinions and viewpoints are key ingredients in our success as a multicultural Ed-Tech company.

Preply will consider all applications for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age or veteran status. Together, we are The World Class.

Title: Senior ML Engineer ‚Äì Speech/Audio (TTS / STT)
Description:
This is a fully remote role, allowing you to work from anywhere in the world.

About Synthflow

At Synthflow we‚Äôre building the easiest way for businesses to create AI-powered phone agents. No coding, no fuss‚Äîjust smarter automation. We‚Äôre passionate about delivering the future of voice technology with lightning-fast, scalable solutions. It‚Äôs an exciting time at Synthflow: we‚Äôre early, fast-growing, and laser-focused on impact. Join us to do the best work of your career while helping businesses thrive.

About The Role

We‚Äôre looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build the next generation of AI-powered speech tools. In this role, you will focus on the design, development, and optimization of cutting-edge TTS and STT models. Your work will play a crucial role in enhancing the performance, naturalness, and accuracy of our speech solutions, directly impacting the user experience.

Your responsibilities will include:


Architect and develop state-of-the-art machine learning models for TTS and STT applications.
Lead the training, fine-tuning, and optimization processes to ensure our speech models achieve top-tier performance.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate these technologies into scalable and robust products.
Drive innovation by staying updated with the latest industry trends and research in speech technologies.
Collaborate with NLP researchers and Software Engineers for the integration of new speech processing algorithms.


Who you are:


You have a solid background in speech technologies with a strong focus on TTS and STT.
You have over 3 years of practical experience in applying machine learning to develop and optimize speech processing systems.
You are proficient in Python and familiar with modern ML frameworks and tools.
You are a problem solver with a keen analytical mind, capable of tackling complex challenges in a dynamic environment.


Beyond the basics:


Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in speech technology, specifically in developing TTS and STT systems.
Strong software development skills and experience with machine learning model implementation.
Demonstrated capability in delivering effective solutions in speech processing.


What We Offer:


Autonomy at speed: High-ownership roles in a fast-moving startup.
Remote-first flexibility: Contribute from anywhere, on your schedule.
Cutting-edge technology: Work on what interests you most.
Career growth: Scale your impact as the company grows.
Rewarding package: Competitive pay, equity options, and comprehensive benefits that reflect your skills and experience.

Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Generative AI & Evaluations Platform (f/m/d)*
Description:
Your Mission

As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer (f/m/d)*, you will work on Parloa‚Äôs Experimentation and Evaluation Platform and the models and software that power our generative AI products. You will work directly with product engineering and sales teams to help them evaluate and improve our AI Agents and the models that power them. You‚Äôll build services that enable customers to evaluate AI Agents and run experiments. You‚Äôll collaborate with Data Scientists to research and develop new product features - from testing new AI system optimisation frameworks to fine-tunning STT models on new languages and accents.

You‚Äôll join the AI & Data Science Team, a collaborative group of Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists that own Parloa‚Äôs ML Platforms and Machine Learning models. The team is responsible for keeping Parloa at the forefront of research and development of Generative AI and AI Agent based products.

In This Role You Will


Take ownership of data science and machine learning projects that help us improve our generative AI product suite
Collaborate with product engineering and sales to shape requirements and our product vision leveraging AI and LLMs in line with customer needs
Execute machine learning projects end-to-end: understanding user-facing requirements, data gathering and transformation, exploratory data analysis, model productionization, maintenance and support, continuous improvement
Shape our ML platform (ML / LLM Ops) by defining the requirements and/or designing and implementing parts of it in collaboration with our data platform and DevOps teams


Our Tech stack (AI & Data): Python, OpenAI, LangGraph, SQL, Microsoft Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, Eventhubs (Kafka), PostHog, Databricks, DeltaLiveTables, Preset

What You Bring To The Table


7+ years of experience as a machine learning engineer
Experience working with NLP, LLMs and information retrieval; experience with LLMs in a production environment is a strong plus
Strong proficiency in Python
Experience working with big data technologies (e.g. Spark) and using ML Ops platforms (e.g. MLFlow)
Experience with owning the ML process end-to-end: from gathering requirements to experimentation to productionisation, monitoring and optimization.
Experience in leading medium-sized technical projects (3-9 months roadmap)
Strong spoken and written communication skills in English


WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?


Be part of a dynamic, driven team of +40 nationalities with flat hierarchies and a collaborative company culture
Flexible office policy - we believe in hiring the best talent, no matter where they are based. However, we love to build real connections and want to welcome everyone in the office
Attractive compensation package
Training and development budget which can be used for conferences and attending development courses to ensure continuous professional growth
Flexible working hours, 28 vacation days and workation opportunities
Enjoy unlimited access to a variety of fitness, yoga, and leisure activities via Wellpass or Urban Sport Club.
We cover the cost of a monthly Deutschland train ticket.
Leverage exclusive offers with our corporate benefits portal, giving you access to compelling deals from leading brands.
Regular team events, game nights, and other social activities
And last but not least: a beautiful office with flair in the heart of Berlin with all the conveniences, such as adjustable desks, social area, fresh fruits, cereals and drinks
Is something missing here? Reach out and let's talk about what else you need for your ideal next growth opportunity


Your Recruiting Process At Parloa

Recruiter video call ‚Üí Hiring Manager Interview ‚Üí Technical Stage (Coding Session) + Machine Learning (Case Study) ‚Üí Meeting the team

Why Parloa?

Parloa is one of the fastest growing startups in the world of Generative AI and customer service. Parloa‚Äôs voice-first GenAI platform for contact centers is built on the best AI technology to automate customer service with natural-sounding conversations for outstanding experiences on all communication channels. Leveraging natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Parloa creates intelligent phone and chat solutions for businesses that turn contact centers into value centers by boosting customer service efficiency. The Parloa platform resolves the majority of customer queries quickly and automatically, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues and relationships. Parloa was founded in 2018 by Malte Kosub and Stefan Ostwald and today employs over 250 people in Berlin, Munich, and New York.

When you join Parloa, you become part of a dynamic and innovative team made up of over 34 nationalities that‚Äôs revolutionizing an entire industry. We‚Äôre passionate about growing together and creating opportunities for personal and professional development. With our recent $66 million Series B investment, we‚Äôre expanding globally and looking for talented individuals to join us on this exciting journey.

Do you have questions about Parloa, the role, or our team before you apply? Please feel free to get in touch with our Hiring Team.

Parloa is committed to upholding the highest data protection standards for our clients' and employees' data. All our employees are instrumental in ensuring the utmost care, GDPR, and ISO compliance, including ISO 27001, in handling sensitive information.


We provide equal opportunities to all qualified applicants regardless race, gender, sexual orientation, age, religion, national origin, disability status, socioeconomic background and other characteristics.

Title: Senior ML / AI Engineer
Description:
Choco is on a mission to enable the global food system to become sustainable by optimizing the way food is sold, ordered, distributed, and financed. Our AI-focused software connects distributors with their customers to operate waste-free and efficiently. A problem of this magnitude requires a massive scale and only the best people will be able to solve it. Are you in?

Here‚Äôs what we‚Äôre up to: https://bit.ly/4fyXonB

We are seeking a Senior Machine Learning Engineer ready to make a true impact.

At Choco we went within 16 months from 0 AI revenue to AI driving 100% of our new revenue. We took AI seriously, not for window dressing, but to bring us to our vision faster and to drive a significant part of our revenue. Because only when AI drives a majority of revenue is it at the core of the company.

We have assembled an absolutely world-class AI team that you will be working with. We work with cutting-edge tech and are an innovation driver in our industry and the broader European ecosystem.

You‚Äôll need to be at the forefront of applied AI research and development, staying on top of industry advancements and constantly seeking ways to improve, validate, and deploy the latest models effectively. You must be an exceptional applied researcher with the ability to turn complex AI technologies into scalable, reliable systems in production. Excellence in engineering skills is a must, as you will be responsible for ensuring our AI models run efficiently, can scale, and meet the rigorous demands of our platform.

We‚Äôre looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, high-execution environment‚Äîsomeone who can learn quickly, adapt to new technologies, take ownership and deliver impactful solutions. You will collaborate with an amazing team, working alongside peers, engineers, and other experts to help us realize our ambitious vision. If you have a passion for AI, the drive to innovate, and the engineering skills to execute at the highest level, we want to hear from you.

Our current tech stack includes AWS serverless stack, Databricks + mlflow, Kubernetes, Kafka, PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Elastic Cloud, the newest models from different vendors incl. OpenAI, Python with common libraries and frameworks. For data transformations, we primarily use SQL, dbt & PySpark.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing

We move fast. We commit to delivering user increments and advancing research on a weekly basis. Team members rotate between a variety of challenging problems. One week, you might be validating hypotheses and assumptions, demonstrating your conclusions in a defendable and reproducible way. The next week, you could be building a proof of concept, and in the third, you'll be shipping the first iteration of your work directly to our users.


Lead end-to-end development of AI and ML systems, incl. experimentation, deployment, optimization and monitoring
Collaborate with and be part of cross-functional teams to integrate sophisticated models into our systems
Carry the team through support, coaching, feedback, tooling, documentation, establishing best practices and knowledge sharing
Develop innovative solutions for complex business challenges


Your Responsibilities


Understand and interpret complex business and customer challenges, translating them into actionable AI solutions.
Ensure AI systems are scalable, efficient, and effective.
Lead by example, demonstrating a strong work ethic, quick iterations, and a commitment to continuous delivery. Embrace and drive Choco's ambitious goals, thriving in a fast-paced, challenging startup environment.
Employ an agile approach, emphasizing swift delivery, responsiveness to feedback, and continuous improvement.


What We‚Äôre Looking For


Expertise with LLMs: Hands-on experience with state-of-the-art language models like GPT-4o, including safely deploying them in production environments. Familiarity with applications and architectures involving conversational agents, fine-tuning, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).
Search and Recommendations: Proven expertise in building personalized search and recommendation systems, with a deep understanding of information retrieval and natural language processing (NLP) challenges like Named Entity Recognition (NER).
Engineering Excellence: Strong programming and engineering skills, with the ability to design, build, and maintain scalable AI systems.
Communication and Collaboration: Clear, effective communication skills, with the ability to translate complex AI concepts into practical, actionable solutions for cross-functional teams.
Startup Mindset: Experience in fast-paced environments, with the ability to navigate ambiguity, take ownership of projects, and - most importantly - get shit done


At Choco, we're experiencing rapid growth and leading the AI revolution in the food supply chain. Our industry-leading Choco AI solution has achieved strong product-market fit, demonstrating the impact of our approach. As a Machine Learning Engineer here, you'll work end-to-end, from conducting deep-dive analyses to building and deploying production-ready ML and AI systems. Join us in our mission to transform the industry through cutting-edge technology and relentless innovation.

Choco was founded in 2018 in Berlin. Now, we are a dedicated team of over 200 Chocorians across Europe and the US. We seek hungry and humble individuals who embrace hard work, put our team first, and are committed to building a lasting company. Our mission demands urgency and speed while maintaining a long-term vision.

In just five years, Choco has raised $328.5 million and achieved unicorn status in 2022, with a valuation of $1.2 billion. We're supported by some of the world‚Äôs best investors like Bessemer Venture Partners, Insight Partners, Coatue Management, and LeftLane Capital.

Choco is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
